targets.expr: (sum(rate(${namespace}http_server_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_route, http_request_method) or sum(rate(${namespace}http_server_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_route, http_request_method) * 0) / sum(rate(${namespace}http_server_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_route, http_request_method )

(sum(rate(${namespace}http_server_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_route, http_request_method) or sum(rate(${namespace}http_server_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_route, http_request_method) * 0) / sum(rate(${namespace}http_server_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", span_kind="SPAN_KIND_SERVER"}[$__rate_interval])) by (http_route, http_request_method)

(sum by (peer_service) (rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service!="", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) or sum by (peer_service) (rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service!=""}[$__rate_interval])) * 0) / sum by (peer_service) (rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

(sum by (service_name) (rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{peer_service="${service}", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) or sum by (service_name) (rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{peer_service="${service}"}[$__rate_interval])) * 0) / sum by (service_name) (rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{peer_service="${service}"}[$__rate_interval]))

(sum(rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service="${dependency}", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (url_template, http_request_method) or sum(rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service="${dependency}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (url_template, http_request_method) * 0) / sum(rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service="${dependency}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (url_template, http_request_method)

panels.description: Performance breakdown for calls from ${service} to ${dependency}

targets.expr: (sum(rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service="${dependency}", http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval])) by (url_template, http_request_method) or sum(rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service="${dependency}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (url_template, http_request_method) * 0) / sum(rate(${namespace}http_client_request_count_total{service_name="${service}", peer_service="${dependency}"}[$__rate_interval])) by (url_template, http_request_method)

panels.title: Http Route Performance Table
